mapper.select: SELECT b.booking_id, b.booking_date, e.event_id, e.name AS event_name, e.start_date, e.end_date, a.audience_id, a.first_name AS audience_first_name, a.last_name AS audience_last_name, a.age, a.gender, a.email, s.staff_id, s.first_name AS staff_first_name, s.last_name AS staff_last_name, s.role, t.ticket_id, t.seat_number FROM bookings b INNER JOIN events e ON b.event_id = e.event_id INNER JOIN audiences a ON b.audience_id = a.audience_id INNER JOIN staffs s ON b.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN tickets t ON b.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE b.booking_id = #{bookingId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookings (booking_date, event_id, audience_id, staff_id, ticket_id) VALUES (#{bookingDate}, #{event.eventId}, #{audience.audienceId}, #{staff.staffId}, #{ticket.ticketId})
mapper.update: UPDATE bookings SET booking_date = #{bookingDate}, event_id = #{event.eventId}, audience_id = #{audience.audienceId}, staff_id = #{staff.staffId}, ticket_id = #{ticket.ticketId} WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId}
